posts.title: Crappy late night cooking
posts.body:
Get the ingredients: Ham, cheese, olive oil and some bread. (Preferably foccacia.)
![img/post/mat/1.jpg](img/post/mat/1.jpg)
Slice it up.
![img/post/mat/2.jpg](img/post/mat/2.jpg)
Now the ham...
![img/post/mat/3.jpg](img/post/mat/3.jpg)
....aaaand the cheese.
![img/post/mat/4.jpg](img/post/mat/4.jpg)
Get that pan oily and add some salt.
![img/post/mat/5.jpg](img/post/mat/5.jpg)
Fry the loaves.
![img/post/mat/6.jpg](img/post/mat/6.jpg)
Put on the ham and cheese.
![img/post/mat/7.jpg](img/post/mat/7.jpg)
Put on a lid and turn off the heat.
![img/post/mat/8.jpg](img/post/mat/8.jpg)
Let it wait a minute or two, so the cheese can melt and voila!
![img/post/mat/9.jpg](img/post/mat/9.jpg)
Crunchy munchies <3
